title: Last day of MN Club's Season - Dec 14th -- No warning
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as Club
AND there is a player on Club that does NOT have a 2017 Addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN the user elects a player that has a current year as MJ player 
AND creates a optional assignment set the date between "Last Playoff Date" (Club date - usually 08/31-09/04 ) and "Rule 5 Draft Date (system date - usually Dec 14th)"
AND submits the transaction to BOC
custom_expected: THEN the user should see no warning

title: Last day of MN Club's Season - Dec 14th -- No Action Item
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as Club
AND there is a player on Club that does NOT have a 2017 Addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN the user elects a player that has a current year as MJ player 
AND creates a optional assignment set the date between "Last Playoff Date" (Club date - usually 08/31-09/04 ) and "Rule 5 Draft Date (system date - usually Dec 14th)"
AND submits the transaction to BOC
custom_expected: THEN the user should see no Action Item on their clipboard

title: Dec 14th - March 15th -- Warning for next year
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as Club
AND there is a player on Club that does NOT have a 2018 Addendum C
AND ONLY have 2017 Add C
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a player that has a current year as MJ player 
AND creates a optional assignment set the date between "Rule 5 Draft Date (system date - usually Dec 14th)" - March 15th 2018
AND submits the transaction to BOC
custom_expected: then system should see warning " Player must have 2018 ADD C"

title: Dec 14th-March 15th -- See No warning

Given user is logged in as Club
AND there is a player on Club that does have a 2017 
And 2018 Addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN the user Selects a player that has a current year as MJ player 
AND creates a optional assignment 
AND submits the transaction to BOC
custom_expected: Then User should see no warning

title: Dec 14th - March 15th -- Warning for Next Year
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as Club 
AND there is a player on Club that does NOT have a 2018 Addendum C  
AND ONLY have 2017 Add C
custom_steps:
WHEN the user elects a player that has a current year as MJ player  
AND creates a Return of 26th Man set the date between "Rule 5 Draft Date (system date - usually Dec 14th)" - March 15th 2018
 AND submits the transaction to BOC
custom_expected: then system should see warning " Player must have 2018 ADD C"
